title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Sports League, and Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) in each Sports League on the y axis.
The highest category is found at National Football League where Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is 9131.8.
Followed by 4408.8 in Major League Baseball.
The lowest category is found at National Hockey League where Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is 1560.4.
The highest value at National Football League is almost 5.85 times larger than the minimum value of National Hockey League.
The highest value at National Football League is almost 5.85 times larger than the minimum value of National Hockey League.
The difference between the max Sports League National Football League and min Sports League National Hockey League is 7571.4.
